setting.label: XBee Device Manager
setting.tooltip: Must be set to the name of an XBeeDeviceManager instance.

setting.label: MAC Address
setting.tooltip: The extended address of the XBee device you would like to monitor.

setting.label: Sleep
setting.tooltip: Determines if we should put the device to sleep between samples.

setting.label: Sleep time
setting.tooltip: If set for sleep, specifies the length of time (in milliseconds) that the module will sleep after a period of awake_time_ms each cycle.

setting.label: Power
setting.tooltip: True/False setting to enable/disable the power output on terminal 6 of the adapter.

setting.label: Channel 1 mode
setting.tooltip:
Operating I/O mode for pin 1 of the adapter. Must be a string value comprised of one of the following:
\t"In" - pin is configured to be an input. \t"Out" - pin is configured to be an output.

setting.label: Channel 2 mode
setting.tooltip:
Operating I/O mode for pin 2 of the adapter. Must be a string value comprised of one of the following:
\t"In" - pin is configured to be an input. \t"Out" - pin is configured to be an output.

setting.label: Channel 3 mode
setting.tooltip:

setting.label: Channel 4 mode
setting.tooltip:
Operating I/O mode for pin 4 of the adapter. Must be a string value comprised of one of the following:
\t"In" - pin is configured to be an input. \t"Out" - pin is configured to be an output.

setting.label: Channel 1 default
setting.tooltip:
If the operating I/O mode for pin 1 of the adapter is set to Out, this value will set the default output value. Must be a value comprised of one of the following:
\t"True" - pin is configured to output high. \t"False" - pin is configured to output low.
NOTE: Do not set this value if you would like to not have any default output value.

setting.label: Channel 1 source
setting.tooltip:
If channel1_dir is configed as an output, this option setting may be specified to a "device.channel" channel name.
The Boolean value of this channel will specify to logic state for pin 1 on the adapter.

setting.label: Awake time
setting.tooltip: How many milliseconds should the device remain awake after waking from sleep.

setting.label: Sample pre-delay
setting.tooltip: How long, in milliseconds, to wait after waking up from sleep before taking a sample from the inputs.

setting.label: Enable low battery
setting.tooltip: Force an adapter to enable support for battery-monitor pin. It should be only enabled if adapter is using internal batteries.
